This FCC ID [https://fccid.io/TC23100X TC23100X] covers the models: *[[Roku 2 HD (3000X)]] *[[Roku 2 XD (3050X)]] *[[Roku 2 XS (3100X)]]
The [[Roku 2 XD (3050X)]] and [[Roku 2 XS (3100X)]] support 1080p.
===Specifications=== Parts used in this device include.. *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/BCM2835 BCM2835] @600MHz ARM<small>1176JZ-F</small> *Flash: ''Hynix'' H27UF082G2B-TPCB 256MB <small>(probably)</small> *RAM: [[Samsung]] K4P2G324EC-AGC1 256MB (LPDDR2) *WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4336 (YKFFBG) 1T1R 802.11bgn *BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM20702 - Bluetooth 4.0 chip *PMU: [[Broadcom]]BCM59002 - Power Management IC
